hero.name: Sebastian Ruiz
hero.description: I <del>break</del> build things for the web

aboutMeText1: I'm Sebastian Ruiz. A web developer, an eternal learner, a creative. I have internet and technology in my veins.
aboutMeText2: My work focuses on building Web Applications (And everything in between) using State of the Art web technologies such as React, NextJS, Javascript, Typescript, Webpack, etc. My self-taught spirit drives me to never stop learning.
aboutMeText3: I also have a big passion for being a person who shares knowledge and teaches people about whatever I learn, that's why I also work as a Mentor with the local communities to engage new people into the ecosystems and encourage them to build amazing things.
aboutMeText4: As a complement to my skills on the Web, I have learned about blockchain technologies such as Web3JS, HardHat, and Solidity Programming to deliver highly efficient Decentralized Apps and Smart contracts.
aboutMeText5: Earlier in my life I learned about Design, photography and Filmmaking. Skills that have been very helpful in my career. The guiding principle of everything I do is: I learn and then teach, and teaching is the way I learn.
